snippet: An important part of the military budget bill will provide female service members with insurance coverage for abortions in cases of rape and incest.
abstract: Editorial welcomes provision in Pres Obama's military budget bill that will lift statutory ban on giving female service members insurance coverage for abortions in cases of rape and incest; maintains further action is still required to provide military women safe access to abortion.
lead_paragraph: An important part of the military budget bill will provide female service members with insurance coverage for abortions in cases of rape and incest.

headline.seo: A Barrier Drops for Military Women
headline.main: A Barrier Drops for Military Women
headline.print_headline: A Barrier Drops for Military Women
